articles.author: WONG AH YOKE
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - The launch of airasia food this month is good news for food vendors and consumers.
With its low commission of 15 per cent and delivery fees starting at $2.99, as well as a wide 15km deli… [+448 chars]
articles.description: "It is good to have competition. If it's a monopoly, the commissions and delivery fees will definitely be higher.". Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.title: Food delivery platforms, merchants welcome launch of airasia food in S'pore - The Straits Times

articles.author: Reuters
articles.content: Leaders of the United States, India, Australia and Japan agreed to pool financing, manufacturing and distribution capacity to send 1 billion coronavirus vaccines across Asia by the end of 2022, India… [+243 chars]
articles.description: The so-called 'Quad' group of four nations want to counter China’s growing vaccination diplomacy.
articles.title: US, India, Australia, Japan agree to send one billion vaccines across Asia - Malaysiakini

articles.title: Student from SUSS convicted on providing 'untraceable' cars with cloned licence plates to criminals - AsiaOne

articles.content: Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, March 12) The Philippines has secured $900 million (about 43.67 billion) in fresh funding from the World Bank and Asian Development Bank for its purchase of COVID-19 va… [+4002 chars]
articles.description: The Philippines has secured $900 million (about ₱43.67 billion) in fresh funding from the World Bank and Asian Development Bank for its purchase of COVID-19 vaccines and measures in response to the health crisis.
articles.title: World Bank, ADB approve $900M in loans for PH vaccine procurement, pandemic response - CNN Philippines
